abstract: Five news stories of other non-Apple tablet news including Twitter features, online privacy and an in-depth look at Microsoft’s Windows 7 XP Mode.
snippet: Five news stories of other non-Apple tablet news including Twitter features, online privacy and an in-depth look at Microsoft’s Windows 7 XP Mode.
lead_paragraph: If you’re not interested in the exorbitant amount of Apple news flowing through the Internet today, here’s a short list of five non-Apple related stories. You’ll be happy to know that there’s lots of interesting news going on outside the Apple ecosystem today, including Twitter‘s new Local Trends feature, a new privacy push for online ads, and AT&T starting a new service to compete with Yelp.com.
